Name: Rembrandt Corner
Review Text: Food was nice and didn‚Äôt take too long. HOWEVER, the waiter was extremely insensitive and asked me and my friend who ordered a sandwich each and pancakes to share if ‚Äúisn‚Äôt that too much?‚Äù. Not only that, but he came back midway into our ‚Ä¶

Name: Rembrandt Corner
Review Text: Fantastic menu selection with lots of more traditional Dutch food as well as other typically European dishes. Everything is very reasonably priced as well. Service was also good.

Name: Rembrandt Corner
Review Text: I have been there with my hubby and daughter and were were treated so well. The pancake was amazing and the club sandwich was incredible.  I told my parents to go there and they had a wonderful time. The staff is really welcoming and nice. ‚Ä¶

Name: Rembrandt Corner
Review Text: Forgive me as I forgot to take photos of this Bistro.  Let me tell you the food is amazing and I heard nothing but praises from my friends at dinner as well.  The atmosphere is pleasant and very Amsterdamish (if that‚Äôs a word).  The beer selection was great and the waitresses are super friendly.

Name: Rembrandt Corner
Review Text: This is a good dining just next to the Rembrandt house! Located in front of the river so nice place! The interior is gorgeous and looks authentic one! They have a Dutch local menus and alcohol! The staffs speak English and credit card is ‚Ä¶

Name: Rembrandt Corner
Review Text: Food is tasty, I had a british breakfast. Staff could be a bit more welcoming. First we waited for 5min until the waitress showed up, then we were told that we would have to move to another table if a group arrives.

Name: Rembrandt Corner
Review Text:
Delicious dishes and tasty beers. The waiters are very helpful and happy working there.
The location is very touristic, yet the place is very nice and very clean.
- Try the stampot it's amazing

Name: Rembrandt Corner
Review Text: Located literally next door to the Rembrandt House, this amazing restaurant offers a large variety of great food. They have traditional Dutch food and American cuisine. They also offered a variety of Vegetarian dishes. No walking away ‚Ä¶

Name: Rembrandt Corner
Review Text: I had a hot chocolate. It was beautiful to look at so I didn't want to drink it but it tasted just as good! It has a very chilled vibe and has some stunning views of the Amsterdam canals!

Name: Rembrandt Corner
Review Text: Exceptionally delicious coffee! Great dishes and very friendly staff

Name: Rembrandt Corner
Review Text: Great restaurant with good quality food. And a really friendly waitress. If you settle down outside you can have a great place a the canalüëå

Name: Rembrandt Corner
Review Text: Didn't try the food but they had nice selections of teas and tasty coffee. Very local atmosphere. Great place to stop by while exploring Amstedam and make yourself warm.

Name: Rembrandt Corner
Review Text: Good atmosphere and service but the food was overpriced for what it is. I paid 11 euros for a Nutella pancake and they gave me two Nutella packets and a can of powdered sugar. It's a bad sign when IHOP puts more effort into food than you.

Name: Rembrandt Corner
Review Text: Pleasant, large cafe with canalside seating. Good food and service and nice beers. A little pricey, but not out of the ordinary.

Name: Rembrandt Corner
Review Text: Great location just next to Rembrandt house museum.  Regional favorites on the menu including stamppot and pancakes.  Also offerings for international travelers yearning for a taste of home - cheese burgers or fish and chips, among others. ‚Ä¶

Name: Rembrandt Corner
Review Text: If you are into having an authentic experience great Dutch food. After a visit in Rembrandt Museum.

Name: Rembrandt Corner
Review Text: Very cute place to eat. Had traditional Dutch food like stamppot, which was very nice. They played nice, relaxing music too. Would go a second time.

Name: Rembrandt Corner
Review Text: Absolutely amazing Dutch food. I had pheasant. It was cooked to perfection. Highly recommend it.

Name: Rembrandt Corner
Review Text: Great food and lovely spot in Amsterdam. Typical Dutch specialities. Hans was very friendly thank you!

Name: Rembrandt Corner
Review Text: Good beer with a good view. I sat outside near the canal. I had one of the traditional dutch meals. Very good.

Name: Rembrandt Corner
Review Text: Lovely restaurant, amazing coffee and food. Wonderful service!

Name: Rembrandt Corner
Review Text: Lovely place. Honest good Dutch food and beer.   I like!

Name: Rembrandt Corner
Review Text: Nice little place ) The food is great )

Name: Rembrandt Corner
Review Text: Stayed around for the corner for a week in February and visited this restaurant multiple times. The traditional Dutch Meatball was by far the best dish I had during my stay. The portions were large and the food itself was very delicious. I can't wait until my next visit.

Name: Rembrandt Corner
Review Text: We asked the waitress for water 3 times but we are still waiting‚Ä¶ We paid the bill and are still waiting the change too..

Name: Rembrandt Corner
Review Text: We bought the nacho's for 7.70 very expensive. We got a smal can of nacho's that we could make at home much better. It's a total scam!

Name: Rembrandt Corner
Review Text: Nice place for coffee and people watching.

Name: Rembrandt Corner
Review Text: We‚Äôve lived in the area for a bit more than six years now. This place has really improved since we‚Äôve been here for the first time. The food is really decent for what it is, service is good, and the place is not expensive for Amsterdam. ‚Ä¶

Name: Rembrandt Corner
Review Text: Super cute building with cozy inside and great outdoor patio seating on the canal. The old corner building has tons of character. It's located right next to Rembrandt's home museum. The menu is huge with lots of great sounding options- true ‚Ä¶

Name: Rembrandt Corner
Review Text: Great food and friendly staff well worth a visit

Name: Rembrandt Corner
Review Text: I had the most amazing lunch here back in March. Meatballs with vegetables. It was a bit expensive because of the location, but was absolutely delicious and we would definitely recommend! Worth the money for authentic and yummy food!

Name: Rembrandt Corner
Review Text: It is cozy and perfect for people watching while having a quick drink or bite to eat.

Name: Rembrandt Corner
Review Text: We had a nice time there. The staff (I think she was Spanish) was really lovely and the food was good. We went there twice or three times and we enjoyed the experience. ‚Ä¶

Name: Rembrandt Corner
Review Text: Traditional Dutch food with familiar options as well  as vegetarian and vegan. Great service!

Name: Rembrandt Corner
Review Text: Sat down here for a great lunch, which included soup, mixed rolls with butter, snack cheese bites, chips and a beer. Nice little diner with outdoor seating, attentive and helpful staff, who got the balance of attention and discretion. Would definitely visit if here again. Well recommended.

Name: Rembrandt Corner
Review Text: It was very quiet when we visited on Monday. In fact we were the only customers for a while. The service was excellent and it was nice to have a good chat with the waitresses. Our food was excellent- Stampot and Stoompotje. Also enjoyed the choice of beer. Trappe beer and Swinckels were enjoyed!!

Name: Rembrandt Corner
Review Text: Nice place, nice people, nice food. I very much enjoyed the burger I ate at the Rembrandt Corner at the nice terrace outside at the canal. The burger was amazing, it was even too much, because it came with fries too. It was tasty and looked ‚Ä¶

Name: Rembrandt Corner
Review Text: Very nice ambience and loves the food

Name: Rembrandt Corner
Review Text: It was really nice there. Friendly staff, a pretty place to sit, even when it's cold, you can sit outside, because of heating. The best: You geht there traditional dutch food, what is really rare in Amsterdam!

Name: Rembrandt Corner
Review Text: A great place to stop, eat, chat, have a drink or two.  Right on the canal, at a corner in the middle of it all, we sat outside underneath a canopy.  We loved our sandwiches and the service was  quick and on top of it.  Highly recommend.

Name: Rembrandt Corner
Review Text: The service was bad. We waited for more than 10 minutes to be served despite trying to get the attention of one of the waiter and when one came she still took time to clean the not dirty and empty tables besides us before even taking our ‚Ä¶

Name: Rembrandt Corner

Review Text: Good food, nice location at the water, friendly staff and reasonable prices. üëç

Name: Rembrandt Corner
Review Text: We all had a long day behind us with Visit all the rembrandt museums etc. Rembrandt corner had an typical Dutch food and drink(s) for us at the end off that sunday (dinner time). That was really a nice experience. Good staff also. Highly recommended Dutch bistro !

Name: Rembrandt Corner
Review Text: Good Service, authentic food,friendly staff, good place to try authentic Dutch food and wide variety of beers

Name: Rembrandt Corner
Review Text: Needed soup to go. Had to get my own container but they humored me! Great food and service. I'm not a fan of the old fashioned Dutch rye bread, but that isn't their fault!

Name: Rembrandt Corner
Review Text:
The waitresses here do not know how to smile, ours in particular was rude.

Name: Rembrandt Corner
Review Text: We have ordered pork on the bone - very tasty meat, suculent and juicy. Loved it today. Nothing wrong with place and all served quickly - we came just after 8.30 p.m in Friday. Would come back for this again

Name: Rembrandt Corner
Review Text: Very friendly staff, did was delicious, would go here again!

Name: Rembrandt Corner
Review Text: The food was good, apple pie and a separate order of ice cream for my husband, along  with  coffee & tea. The ‚Ç¨2.40 extra charge for 1 more cup of hot water for refilling the tea (same tea bag) was excessive. Nice place, nice people, but bad idea to charge for hot water.

Name: Rembrandt Corner
Review Text: My girlfriend and I were told to sit anywhere by the waiter (manager?), we went to sit at a four person table he told us we can't sit there as it would be easier for him to serve us at a two person table (there were plenty of free four ‚Ä¶

Name: Rembrandt Corner
Review Text: An interesting spot to stop and take a rest, looking over the canal. The food and beverage list was average, the food itself was again average but that is to be expected in a small cafe on a tourist route. Nothing wrong with the place at all.

Name: Rembrandt Corner
Review Text: Ordered 2 half-chicken dishes, both of them turned out raw. Decided not to make a problem so I asked them to cook them some more. When it came back 10 minutes later it was still raw, so we munched mostly on our extra free fries. Now my girlfriend is ill and vomiting for a dinner that cost us 30 euro.

Name: Rembrandt Corner
Review Text:
WORST EVER EXPERIENCE!

Name: Rembrandt Corner
Review Text: Nice place with pretty good cuisine

Name: Rembrandt Corner
Review Text: Came with 4 people, 3 people had problems with their order.  Told the manager and she seemed very frustrated (maybe at us or her undertrained waitress, it was not clear).  Minutes later she told her waitress to apologize in front of ‚Ä¶

Name: Rembrandt Corner
Review Text: Horrible food and rude staff. I had the soup which was so watery and tasted like instant soup. My friend had a sandwich which tasted like it had come out of a packet. The meat was from a packet and so were the eggs. Couldn't even eat it and it wasn't cheap either. Worst meal I've had in Amsterdam by a long way.

Name: Rembrandt Corner
Review Text: Had a great time here! I was looking for a place to eat before checking into my room, and had a big breakfast and some coffee. It's not some magical food or anything, but it hits the spot and was well worth the 17 euro total. Also the staff was just very nice!

Name: Rembrandt Corner
Review Text: Not bad for some simply food. Portions could be bigger.

Review Text: Ambiance very cosy, food fresh and good, prices are more than correct, waitress are very nice, if you want to discover an "old Amsterdam" atmosphere, and to eat very good, I strongly recommend this place !
